name: 10 Second DJ
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare theme "Every 10 seconds"

You have 10 seconds to choose some music and arrange the pegs on the board, then watch your audience bop along to your music and light show.

Please give me a vote on the Ludum Dare site!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/10-second-dj

All audio by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
